summary: Raises the maximum number of potential Blades from three to six.
descriptionHtml:
I quickly threw this mod together in response to a request on the Nexus forums. It doubles the maximum number of recruitable Blades from three to six. Note that this mod has not yet been tested, use at your own risk.

If this mod doesn\'t work on your save, it\'s probably because you\'re working with your old BladeCount value. Try using the console to set the quest \"FreeformSkyHavenTempleA\"s stage to 20, which should correct the problem.
author: JanusForbeare
